Enums/TNQueueFailureMode.html#/s:12Termi.name: cancelAll

Enums/TNQueueFailureMode.html#/s:12Termi.abstract: Continues the execution of the queue after a request (operation) fails

Enums/TNPath.html#/s:12TermiNetwork6TNPa.name: convertedPath
Enums/TNPath.html#/s:12TermiNetwork6TNPa.abstract: Returns the constructed path as String based on .path components.

Enums/TNPath.html#/s:12TermiNetwork6TNPa.abstract: An enum case that can be used where path is needed. For example: .path([“user”, “1”, “details”]).

Enums/TNError.html#/s:12TermiNetwork7TNE.name: middlewareError(_:)

Classes/TNRequest.html.name: TNRequest
Classes/TNRequest.html.abstract: The core class of TermiNetwork. It uses all

Classes/TNConfiguration.html.name: TNConfiguration
Classes/TNConfiguration.html.abstract: A generic configuration class that can be used with TNEnvironment, TNRouteConfiguration and TNRequest.

Classes/TNEnvironment.html.name: TNEnvironment
Classes/TNEnvironment.html.abstract: The TNEnvironment contains information about host, port, configuration and it’s used in TNRequest instances.

Classes/TNOperation.html.name: TNOperation
Classes/TNOperation.html.abstract: This class is inherited by TNRequest to control the execution of the request.

Classes/TNQueue.html.name: TNQueue
Classes/TNQueue.html.abstract: This class can be used to create custom queues

Classes/TNRouter.html.name: TNRouter
Classes/TNRouter.html.abstract: This class is used to create instances of TNRouter that can be used to start requests based on the given Route.
